item.description:
With less than perfect weather (mostly cloudy), I thought a shorter ride was in order.

We will head out on the Pike to Huntington, MA (about 2 hours) then backtrack to NorthHampton, Amherst and then toward home via Rt 2.

Total ride length, about 200 Miles (5 hours in the saddle) and another 5 hours of stops and breaks for gas, food, or take in the scenery. We should be back in time for you to take your mom to dinner.

We start at 6am from Newton (earlier if humanly possible)

Here is the proposed route: GOOGLE MAP

Riders can meetup at the Marriott at 6am or at the Westborough Plaza on the Pike at 6:30am, please indicate where you will join us when you RSVP.

If the weather changes, I'll send out an email Saturday Afternoon

Hope you can join us!

Paul
item.name: The Shorter Son of the ride to VT
